cast.overview: San Francisco Bay, January 18, 1960. Frank Lee Morris is transferred to Alcatraz, a maximum security prison located on a rocky island. Although no one has ever managed to escape from there, Frank and other inmates begin to carefully prepare an escape plan.
cast.title: Escape from Alcatraz

details.biography:
Regina Baff was born on March 31, 1949 in The Bronx, New York, USA. She is an actress, known for Escape from Alcatraz (1979), The Great Gatsby (1974) and The Paper Chase(1973).

Was nominated for Broadway's 1974 Tony Award as Best Supporting or Featured Actress (Dramatic) for "Veronica's Room."
details.name: Regina Baff
